event.description: We are reusing a 'websites' topic and the messages are differentiated by 'event'

deploy_id.description: An ID that events can be grouped on

cms_urn.description: When multi-domain, it's the website_urn. When single-domain, it's the client.website.urn

owner_urn.description: The website's owner URN. It's either a client_urn or location_urn

cms_repo_dir.description: The location of the CMS repo-dir. This directory automatically gets deleted by a nightly job

gcs_cp_command.description: The Google Cloud Storage command executed to copy the contents of 'cms_repo_dir' to GCS
